description.value: Memories of your first life are strong and continually return to you, even after several incarnations. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Adopted Ancestry] feat and can choose any common or uncommon humanoid ancestry with the feat. You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Additional Lore] general feat for your chosen ancestry's Lore, such as Dwarven Lore or Ratfolk Lore.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
